Package mullan.sean.coinz

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClickListener
    Interface to be used with RecyclerView Adapters to detect the position of an item that has been clicked in the list
    OnEventListener<T>
    Interface to be used for asynchronous tasks to identify when the task finishes and if it was a success or failure
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BankFragment
    Fragment that hosts bank details, including amount of gold in users account, the current days exchange rates, and the user's transaction history.
    Coin
    A Coin object stores the id, value, currency and location of the coin.
    CoinAdapter
    Adapter class to store Coin objects
    Data
    This class serves as the applications global data structure that stores the relevant data accessible from all fragments so that no two fragments have to communicate between each other.
    DownloadFileTask
    Class for sending HTTP GET request to specified URL and returning received data as a String
    FriendAdapter
    Adapter class to store User objects that represent the users friends
    FriendAdapter.MyViewHolder
    Provides a reference to the views for each data item (username and email)
    FriendsFragment
    Fragment that hosts friends and friend request details.
    LeaderBoardAdapter
    Adapter class to store User objects for leader board
    LeaderBoardAdapter.MyViewHolder
    Provides a reference to the views for each data item (username and amount of gold)
    LeaderBoardFragment
    Fragment that hosts friends and global leader board.
    LoginActivity
    Activity to Log in existing users
    MainActivity
    Executes the data retrieval sequence upon boot up of the app after log in, and hosts all the fragments in the application which are navigated using the bottom navigation view.
    MapFragment
    Fragment that hosts the MapBox map and Coin objects which are displayed as markers
    RegisterActivity
    Activity to register a user on Firebase
    RequestAdapter
    Adapter class for User objects that represent friend requests
    RequestAdapter.MyViewHolder
    Provides a reference to the views for each data item (username, email, accept and decline)
    ResetPasswordActivity
    Activity to reset users password
    Transaction
    A Transaction object stores the amount of gold that was added in a single transaction and the date of the transaction.
    TransactionAdapter
    Adapter class to store Transaction objects
    TransactionAdapter.MyViewHolder
    Provides a reference to the views for each data item (gold amount and date of transaction)
    User
    A User object stores the users ID, username, email and the amount of gold they have
    WalletFragment
    Fragment that hosts the users Collected and Received coins, and handles transferring coins to the users bank account or to a friend
